channel.title: 317 - Player saving question
channel.description:
Hi there,
I would like to know if anyone know a code for players that are OFFLINE to save the savemoreinfo file. If there is a tut i love to have it to :).
Basic:
if there a code for saving players that are OFFLINE. The savemorinfo file. thanks!

item.title: 317 - Player saving question
item.dc:creator: @matzie matzie
item.description:
@matzie wrote:

Why save a file for someone offline? need a better description of what you are trying to doâ€¦
But you would have to load the file, edit it, then save it again.
Using java.io.FileInputStream,java.io.FileOutputStream;
or the BufferedWriter, for things like reading strings. I converted my server to .dat saves to make it smaller files, and just wrote a .dat editor

Read full topic
